inclusion.criterion: Veteran eligible for services through Veteran Health Affairs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: experience moderate to severe chronic pain on a regular basis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: able to read, speak and understand English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: current or history of psychiatric or behavioral issues that require immediate attention and/or prevent the subject from participating effectively in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: reported use of a high dose of an opioid(s)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 39-year-old man with cough and shortness of breath, history of asthma, uses inhaled corticosteroid and fluticasone.
